branchCategory.name: MVGQ
branchCategory.description: Series MVGQ incorporates a valve, speed controller, and cylinder into one compact unit.  A built-in magnet makes the MVGQ auto switch capable.  Switch easily between rod extended when energized and rod retracted when energized by changing the orientation of the switching plate for SYJ3000, VZ3000, VZ5000 valves, and by changing the mounting orientation of the valves for series VF3000.  The MVGQ can be mounted on the side or bottom.  Two kinds of guide bearings, slide or ball bushing, are offered to suit individual use.  MVGQ's built-in speed controllers make selection of meter-out or meter-in possible.

branchItem.name: MVGQ Valve Mounted Guide Cylinder, 12-20 Bore
branchItem.description: Series MVGQ incorporates a valve, speed controller, and cylinder into one compact unit.  A built-in magnet makes the MVGQ auto swich capable.  Switch easily between rod extended when energized and rod retracted when energized by changing the orientation of the switching plate for SYJ3000, VZ3000, VZ5000 valves, and by changing the mounting orientation of the valves for series VF3000.  The MVGQ can be mounted on the side or bottom.  Two kinds of guide bearings, slide or ball bushing, are offered to suit individual use.  MVGQ's built-in speed controllers make selection of meter-out or meter-in possible.
